𓀄 cover kauer ⇔

𒆠𒁺 KIᵛRE "bury" קָבַר kavár 𓈎 𓂋 ܩܵܒ݂ܹܪ qawer কবৰ kobor قَبَرَ qabara gebury “to bury”
𒆠𒁺 ki'tum₂ "bury" ge-tomb kiʳtum₂ kiʳˢtum₂ :

𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓁀 | bury | curse™ 𒆠𒁺 kiʳtum₂ kiʳˢtum₂ <> christ 𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓁀 | bury | <> grave 𒆠𒇲 dig 𒆠𒄯 scratch(earth) Gebahre: 𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓁀 | bury | ܩܵܒ݂ܹܪ qawer קָבַר kavár 𓈎 𓂋 কবৰ kobor قَبَرَ qabara “to bury” ( 𓈎 qab? မြှုပ် hmrup )
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓀄 | burial | ⇔ 𓌨 ground 𓈎 𓈖 𓊃 | bury
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓀄 | burial | curse™
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓀜 | bury | kurgan!! / curse™ qabaru qbara qboro to bury +++ course cure
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓌟 𓂝 𓊭 | bury | curse™ kurgan
𓈎 𓂋 𓋴 𓏏 𓊭 | burial | … 𓏏 tell թաղել tʿałel tomb

𒆠𒈤𒄷 ki-maḫ-ḫu "tomb" ⇔ መቃብር mäḳabr makaber مقابر maqâbir
